info.name: YouTube Video Dim - KMV
info.description:
Simple script to dim the light output on YouTube videos by 25%.

Designed to complement my YouTube Black Theme;
https://userstyles.org/styles/174767/

but will work with any.



The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/

Source of screenshot;
https://youtu.be/pp95UwZGD8Y
info.additionalInfo:
2021-09-08 Chrome issues resolved.

2020-10-18 Problems on Chrome/Chromium - Videos freeze and black out. Added notification in description.

2020-08-11 Implemented "!important" to compensate for a new setting on main theme.

2020-05-23 Added dimming to Preview Images on embedded YT videos on external webpages.

2020-04-26 Switched dim-method from Opacity to Brightness.
